mapper.insert: insert into accommodation(acc_name, acc_exp, acc_loc, acc_phone) values (#{acc_name}, #{acc_exp}, #{acc_loc}, #{acc_phone})
mapper.update: update accommodation set acc_name = #{acc_name}, acc_exp = #{acc_exp}, acc_loc = #{acc_loc}, acc_phone = #{acc_phone}, moddate = #{moddate} where ano = #{ano}
mapper.insert: insert into accommodation_img (uuid, file_name, ano) values (#{uuid}, #{file_name}, #{ano})
mapper.update: update accommodation_img set uuid = #{uuid}, file_name = #{file_name}, ano = #{ano} where ord = #{ord}
